sentences.english: The rectal wall is thin and has no serosal covering .
sentences.chinese: 直腸壁薄而沒有漿膜覆蓋。

sentences.english: One explanation has to do with the difference in the permeability of intestinal walls.
sentences.chinese: 一種解釋和腸壁通透性的差異有關。

sentences.english: They then penetrate the wall of the intestine and migrate through the body.
sentences.chinese: 幼蟲隨後穿過腸壁，並在身體內遊走。

sentences.english: Polyps were showed as high echo and the wall was continous.
sentences.chinese: 息肉表現爲圓形略強回聲，附着處腸壁連續關係正常。

sentences.english: Results All cases were shown as bowel wall thickening, with luminal narrowing.
sentences.chinese: 結果所有病例均顯示腸壁增厚和腸腔狹窄。

sentences.english: The wall is thin and almost transparent probably due to atrophy of the villi .
sentences.chinese: 腸壁薄，幾乎是透明的，這可能是因絨毛萎縮。

sentences.english: Two pairs of liver diverticulum respectively protrude from the anterior wall of mid-gut.
sentences.chinese: 兩對肝盲囊分別發生自中腸的前段腸壁。

sentences.english: If the intestinal walls are chronically inflamed lipolysis is disturbed.
sentences.chinese: 如果腸壁慢性炎症脂解作用被擾亂。

sentences.english: The rectal wall is thin and has no serosal covering.
sentences.chinese: 直腸壁薄而沒有漿膜覆蓋。

definition: inner product/the dot product of two vectors
